title: Larry Chen!
description:
What's the best way to take a photo of a car? Which camera should you use? Which phone? How do you buy a GT-R for $12? Larry Chen is here to help.
 

Larry Chen is one of the most well-known and respected  automotive/motorsports photographers in the world. He's made a name for himself by capturing exciting moments in drifting, desert racing, and hill climbing. He's a kind person who not only shoots photos but teaches photography classes for Canon, hosts a show with Hoonigan, and has an awesome fleet of cars himself.  

 

On this episode we talk about his new Hot Wheels cars, new pins, new camera tech, the best smart phone camera, how to shoot cars with a phone, why more photographers is a good thing, and more.

 

https://www.youtube.com/c/LarryChenPhoto

https://www.larrychenphoto.com

https://www.etsy.com/shop/LarryChenPhoto

@larry_chen_foto

 

Follow us:

@thesmokingtire

@therealzackklapman

 

Want to find the right parts for you car? Head to http://carparts.com/thesmokingtire and get 10% off a purchase of $100 or more.

 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

 

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

 

Sign up at ButcherBox.com/TIRE and get 2 lbs of ground beef free in every order for the life of your membership.  

 

Patreon members got to watch the live stream, and our Pro Driver tier patrons have been able to watch or listen to this episode since the day we recorded it. Want your questions answered, to watch a live-stream, listen ad-free, or get early access? Join our Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
